name: issimpgd

stmt.origin: sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg), wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o))
stmt.pretty: sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ SimpGrp, c0 ∈ Grp, (NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o))
-| wb(wcel(c0, csimpg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (w0 →(NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SimpGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o))
-| wb(wcel(c0, csimpg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (w0 →(NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SimpGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧(NrmSGrp ` c0)[≅]2o))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, csimpg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))

-| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cnsg, c0), cen, c2o))
